DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety Q Fever Vaccine , Phase I , Inactivated , Dried , NDBR 105 collect data incidence occupational Q fever infection vaccinate personnel .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old . Females childbearing potential must agree urine pregnancy test day receipt skin test AND vaccine . ( Exception : documented hysterectomy â‰¥ 3 year menopause . ) The result must negative . Females must agree become pregnant 3 month receipt skin test vaccination . Considered risk exposure C burnetii submit Request Investigational New Drug ( IND ) Vaccines Q Fever vaccine . Sign date approve informed consent document Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) Authorization . Have chart : Uptodate medical history ( include concomitant medication ) Physical examination laboratory test within 1 year Previous chest xray electrocardiogram Be medically clear participation investigator . Examinations test may repeat discretion enrol physician . Willing return followup visit . Agree report adverse event ( AEs ) may may associate administration test article least 28 day vaccination agree report serious adverse event ( example , result hospitalization ) duration subject 's participation study ( 6 month ) . Agree defer blood , bone marrow , organ donation 1 year receipt skin test antigen and/or vaccine . Prior history Q fever disease vaccination . Clinically significant abnormal lab result ( include evidence hepatitis C , hepatitis B carrier state ) elevate liver function test ( two time normal range discretion principal investigator ) . Personal history immunodeficiency current treatment oral intravenous immunosuppressive medication . Confirmed HIV infection . Heart valve disease : prosthetic heart valve clinically significant heart murmur . ( If murmur detected examination , echocardiogram may obtain subject may refer cardiologist determine clinical significance . ) Aneurysm/vascular graft . Joint prosthesis . History chronic fatigue syndrome ( positive chronic fatigue syndrome ( CFS ) Questionnaire criterion ) . Positive pregnancy test breastfeed female . Any known allergy component vaccine : Formalin Eggs chicken product Administration another vaccine investigational product within 28 day skin test subsequent Q fever vaccination . Any unresolved AE result previous immunization . Transplant recipient , subject cancer , chronic kidney disease . A medical condition , judgment principal investigator , would impact subject safety .
